name: NEVPNIKEAuthenticationMethod
desc: Internet Key Exchange (IKE) authentication methods used to authenticate with the IPSec server.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Do not authenticate with the IPSec server. Note that extended authentication may still be performed if the useExtendedAuthentication property is set. This value is only valid for IKE version 2 (IKEv2)

items.name: case certificate
items.desc: Use a certificate and private key as the authentication credential. The certificate and private key set in the identityReference or identityData property will be used.

items.name: case sharedSecret
items.desc: Use a shared secret as the authentication credential. The shared secret set in the sharedSecretReference property will be used.
